message: The COVERAGE field for indicator 1-2-1, translated into en
data:
Data availability:

Data availability depends on the availability of household surveys and analysis of survey data. Data for total poverty are currently available for 154 countries.

Time series:

Data are available from 1985 to 2020. Because the effort and capacity of collecting and analysing survey data are different for each country, the length of the time series for each country varies greatly.

Disaggregation:

Currently no disaggregation is made.
